name: PlayStation 1
description: Sony PlayStation 1 (PSX/PS1) games via RetroArch using the Beetle PSX HW core. Supports disc images and compressed formats. Requires BIOS files for full compatibility.
notes: PlayStation 1 emulation requires BIOS files (scph5500.bin, scph5501.bin, scph5502.bin) placed in the system directory. CHD format is recommended for compressed disc images. Multi-disc games should use .m3u playlist files.
